description: In add_attr of sdp_discovery.c in Android-7.0, Android-7.1.1, Android-7.1.2, Android-8.0, Android-8.1 and Android-9, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Android ID: A-115900043.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9
